mapper.insert: insert into report_post_tb values( REPORT_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, 0, #{category_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{board_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{post_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select p.ID, p.DESCRIPTION, p.CREATED_DATE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, b.BOARD_TABLE_NAME, b.BOARD_TABLE_ADDRESS, p.POST_ID, u.NICKNAME,p.board_id from report_post_tb p, report_category_tb c, board_name_tb b, user_tb u where p.user_id = u.id and c.id=p.category_id and p.board_id = b.id

select p.ID, p.DESCRIPTION, p.CREATED_DATE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, b.BOARD_TABLE_NAME, p.POST_ID, u.NICKNAME from report_post_tb p, report_category_tb c, board_name_tb b, user_tb u where DELETED=0 order by id;
